text:
Shirin d'Deneith is the Lord Commander of the [[Blademarks Guild]]. Shirin is chief among activists within House [[Deneith]] who feel that, in the wake of the [[Last War]] and the weakened [[Five Nations]], it is time for the house to rise up and forge a new kingdom. He keeps this dream of conquest foremost in the thoughts of other house members; well-spoken and charismatic, he has drawn many like-minded individuals to him.

Shirin has also made secret contacts with the Order of the [[Emerald Claw]], hoping to use their resources to help him wrest control of House [[Deneith]] away from Baron [[Breven|Breven d'Deneith]].
title: Shirin d'Deneith
tooltip: ambitious leader of the Blademarks Guild
